headline.main: Group Often Referred to as a Red Front Demands Help to Soviet and Britain for the Defeat of Nazis

lead_paragraph: The American Peace Mobilization, an organization that picketed Congress in February in opposition to the Lease-Lend Bill and recently picketed the White House for forty days in protest against President's Roosevelt's foreign policies and aid to the democracies, announced yesterday that it now was in favor of aid to the Soviet Union, Great Britain and other nations fighting Nazi Germany.
abstract: by Amer Peace Mobilization; by NMU
